entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
